languages.text: "Почтенный регент, возможно, я могла бы продолжить свое обучение, и при этом сопровождать и дальше Вольного Торговца в {mf|его|ее} странствиях? Только представьте, сколь многому я могу научиться за пределами..." {n}Кассия замолкает, заметив гневный взгляд регента{/n}.

traits.locale_text: "Почтенный регент, возможно, я могла бы продолжить свое обучение, и при этом сопровождать и дальше Вольного Торговца в {mf|его|ее} плаваниях? Только представьте, сколь многому я могу научиться за пределами..." {n}Кассия замолкает, заметив гневный взгляд регента{/n}.

languages.text: "Esteemed Regent, perhaps I could continue my education while still accompanying the Rogue Trader on {mf|his|her} travels? Just imagine how much I could learn beyond the bounds of..." {n}Cassia notices the regent's furious glare and falls short{/n}.
languages.original_text: "Почтенный регент, возможно, я могла бы продолжить свое обучение, и при этом сопровождать и дальше Вольного Торговца в {mf|его|ее} странствиях? Только представьте, сколь многому я могу научиться за пределами..." {n}Кассия замолкает, заметив гневный взгляд регента{/n}.

traits.locale_text: "Esteemed regent, what if I could continue my education and still accompany the Rogue Trader in {mf|his|her} journeys? Just imagine how much I could learn beyond the bounds of..." {n}Cassia notices the regent's furious glare and falls short{/n}.

"Esteemed regent, what if I could continue my education and still accompany the Rogue Trader in {mf|his|her} journeys? Just imagine how much I could learn beyond the bounds of..." {n}Cassia notices the regent's furious glare and falls short{/n}.

"Esteemed Regent, perhaps I could continue my education while still accompanying the Rogue Trader on {mf|his|her} travels? Just imagine how much I could learn beyond the bounds of..." {n}Cassia notices the regent's furious glare and falls short{/n}.

"Esteemed Regent, perhaps I could continue my education while still accompanying the Rogue Trader on {mf|his|her} travels? Just imagine how much I could learn beyond the bounds of..." {n}Cassia notices the regent's furious glare and falls short{/n}.

"Esteemed Regent, perhaps I could continue my education while still accompanying the Rogue Trader on {mf|his|her} travels? Just imagine how much I could learn beyond the bounds of..." {n}Cassia notices the regent's furious glare and falls short{/n}.

languages.text: “尊敬的摄政王，或许我可以在接受教育的同时，继续陪伴行商浪人一起航行？想象一下，我会学到多少书本中无法获得的知识……”{n}卡西娅留意到摄政王愤怒的目光，便赶紧住了口。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Esteemed Regent, perhaps I could continue my education while still accompanying the Rogue Trader on {mf|his|her} travels? Just imagine how much I could learn beyond the bounds of..." {n}Cassia notices the regent's furious glare and falls short{/n}.

traits.locale_text: “尊敬的摄政王，或许我可以在接受教育的同时，继续陪伴行商浪人一起航行？想象一下，我会学到多少书本中无法获得的知识……”{n}卡西娅留意到摄政王愤怒的目光，便赶紧住了口。{/n}

languages.text: «Estimado regente, ¿cree que podría continuar mi educación mientras acompaño a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente en sus viajes? Piense en lo que podría aprender fuera de los confines de...». {n}Cassia nota la furiosa mirada del regente y calla.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Esteemed Regent, perhaps I could continue my education while still accompanying the Rogue Trader on {mf|his|her} travels? Just imagine how much I could learn beyond the bounds of..." {n}Cassia notices the regent's furious glare and falls short{/n}.

traits.locale_text: «Estimado regente, ¿cree que podría continuar mi educación mientras acompaño a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente en sus viajes? Piense en lo que podría aprender fuera de los confines de...». {n}Cassia nota la furiosa mirada del regente y calla.{/n}

languages.text: 「尊敬する摂政、私はローグトレーダーの旅に同行しながら教育を続けることができないでしょうか？その旅路でどれほどの学びがあるか想像してみて…」{n}カシアは摂政の怒りに満ちた視線に気づき、言葉を詰まらせる。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Esteemed Regent, perhaps I could continue my education while still accompanying the Rogue Trader on {mf|his|her} travels? Just imagine how much I could learn beyond the bounds of..." {n}Cassia notices the regent's furious glare and falls short{/n}.

traits.locale_text: 「尊敬する摂政、私はローグトレーダーの旅に同行しながら教育を続けることができないでしょうか？その旅路でどれほどの学びがあるか想像してみて…」{n}カシアは摂政の怒りに満ちた視線に気づき、言葉を詰まらせる。{/n}

languages.text: "Geschätzter Regent, vielleicht könnte ich meine Ausbildung fortsetzen, während ich {mf|den Freihändler auf seinen|die Freihändlerin auf ihren} Reisen begleite? Bedenkt doch, wie viel ich lernen könnte jenseits der Grenzen von ...?" {n}Cassia bemerkt den wütenden Blick des Regenten und verstummt.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Esteemed Regent, perhaps I could continue my education while still accompanying the Rogue Trader on {mf|his|her} travels? Just imagine how much I could learn beyond the bounds of..." {n}Cassia notices the regent's furious glare and falls short{/n}.

traits.locale_text: "Geschätzter Regent, vielleicht könnte ich meine Ausbildung fortsetzen, während ich {mf|den Freihändler auf seinen|die Freihändlerin auf ihren} Reisen begleite? Bedenkt doch, wie viel ich lernen könnte jenseits der Grenzen von ...?" {n}Cassia bemerkt den wütenden Blick des Regenten und verstummt.{/n}

languages.text: « Vénérable régent, peut-être pourrais-je poursuivre mon éducation en accompagnant {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} dans ses pérégrinations ? Imaginez tout ce que je pourrais apprendre au-delà des frontières de... » {n}La voix de Cassia s'éteint sous le regard furieux du régent.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Esteemed Regent, perhaps I could continue my education while still accompanying the Rogue Trader on {mf|his|her} travels? Just imagine how much I could learn beyond the bounds of..." {n}Cassia notices the regent's furious glare and falls short{/n}.

traits.locale_text: « Vénérable régent, peut-être pourrais-je poursuivre mon éducation en accompagnant {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} dans ses pérégrinations ? Imaginez tout ce que je pourrais apprendre au-delà des frontières de... » {n}La voix de Cassia s'éteint sous le regard furieux du régent.{/n}

languages.text: "Çok değerli Naip, Hür Tacir'e seyahatlerinde eşlik etmeyi sürdürürken eğitimimi devam ettirmem mümkün mü? Sınırlarımız dışında öğrenebileceklerimi hayal..." {n}Cassia, naibin öfkeli bakışlarını fark edip sözlerini yarıda kesiyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Esteemed Regent, perhaps I could continue my education while still accompanying the Rogue Trader on {mf|his|her} travels? Just imagine how much I could learn beyond the bounds of..." {n}Cassia notices the regent's furious glare and falls short{/n}.

traits.locale_text: "Çok değerli Naip, belki de eğitimimi, Hür Tacir'e seyahatlerinde eşlik etmeyi sürdürürken devam ettirebilirim? Sınırlarımız dışında öğrenebileceklerimi hayal..." {n}Cassia naibin öfkeli bakışlarını fark ediyor ve sözlerini yarıda kesiyor.{/n}
